definition[0]: a computer system containing a lot of information about one particular subject, so that it can help someone find an answer to a problem
definition[1]: a computer system that contains a lot of information about a subject and is designed to copy the thought processes of experts in that subject so that it can help someone find an answer to a problem
example[0]: Expert systems can improve human expertise and allow it to be used more efficiently in the specific working environment of aircraft maintenance.
